completeListOfAbilities.name: Weaponsmaster

Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Deals total HP damage to each target
Moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP
Extends own active buff duration 2 turns
Becomes Weaponsmaster+ (tremendous BRV damage boost) while HP is at least 80% of MAX

passives.short_desc: Where the Wild Roses Bloom: Gains HP recovery amount exceeding MAX HP as BRV

passives.name: All HP Initial Boost
passives.desc: Moderately raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV while own HP is at least 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: All HP Initial Boost: Raises party's INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: Blood Weapon Extension
passives.desc:
Blood Weapon use +1

When using Blood Weapon:
 • Slight BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • Slightly increased HP recovery limit
 • Self: 6 turns Blood Weapon buff

While HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • Blood Weapon becomes Blood Weapon+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 4; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage)

While Blood Weapon buff active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (melee BRV attack; slightly increased BRV damage; grants party BRV based on own ATK; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
passives.short_desc: Blood Weapon Extension: Boost to Blood Weapon

passives.name: HP Attack Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises ATK、 SPD while own HP is at least 50% of MAX
passives.short_desc: HP Attack Speed: Raises ATK、 SPD

passives.name: Seize Attack Extension
passives.desc:
When using Seize Attack:
 • Moderate damage boost

When using Seize Attack+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; slightly increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slight MAX BRV Up boost
 • Granted buff duration +2
 • Triggers additional HP attack after use

While Blood Weapon buff active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
• Seize Attack+ becomes Seize Attack+ (Blood Weapon) (moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 15% of own MAX HP)
passives.short_desc: Seize Attack Extension: Boost to Seize Attack

passives.name: Shatter Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Shatter Brilliance: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: HP Drain Advance Thrust Extension
passives.desc: When using HP Drain Advance Thrust:\n • Slight boost to increased stolen BRV limit
passives.short_desc: HP Drain Advance Thrust Extension: Boost to HP Drain Advance Thrust

passive.name: HP Drain Advance Thrust Growth
passive.desc: HP Drain Advance Thrust use +1\n\nHP Drain Advance Thrust effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: HP Drain Advance Thrust Growth: Boost to HP Drain Advance Thrust

passive.name: HP Heal Boost Longer
passive.desc: Raises own MAX BRV by 10% for 6 turns when recovering own HP
passive.short_desc: HP Heal Boost Longer: Raises MAX BRV

passive.name: Energy Drain
passive.desc: When using Blood Weapon、 Blood Weapon+:\n • BRV damage boost\n • Increased HP recovery limit
passive.short_desc: Energy Drain: Boost to Blood Weapon

passive.name: Master of the Sword
passive.desc:
When using Seize Attack、 Seize Attack+、 Seize Attack+ (Blood Weapon):
 • BRV damage boost
 
When using Seize Attack+、 Seize Attack+ (Blood Weapon):
 • MAX BRV Up boost、 duration+
  • BRV granted to party based on own ATK
  • Self: 6 turns BRV Regen
passive.short_desc: Master of the Sword: Boost to Seize Attack

passives.short_desc: Weaponsmaster HP Drain Advance Buff Longer: Boost to Weaponsmaster

passives.name: Mastery of Arms Manifold Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Sun Blade (II)+ or passive ability Mastery of Arms Manifold Extension:\n • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 ATK
passives.short_desc: Mastery of Arms Manifold Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Weaponsmaster Buff Plus Blood Weapon Buff Starting
passives.desc:
When using Weaponsmaster、 Weaponsmaster+:
 • Self: 4 turns Hot Blooded

6 turns Blood Weapon buff、 Hot Blooded at start of quest
passives.short_desc: Weaponsmaster Buff Plus Blood Weapon Buff Starting: Boost to Weaponsmaster

passives.name: Weaponsmaster BRV Hit Plus Force Advance++
passives.desc:
When using Weaponsmaster、 Weaponsmaster+:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 8; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV

While Blood Weapon buff active and HP at least 50% of MAX:
 • BRV Attack、 BRV Attack+ become BRV Attack++ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; slight cumulative BRV damage boost over BRV Attack+; grants party BRV based on own ATK; slightly restores own HP based on BRV damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
 • HP Attack、 HP Attack+ become HP Attack++ (increases BRV based on ATK before HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slightly restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 5% of own MAX HP)
passives.short_desc: Weaponsmaster BRV Hit Plus Force Advance++: Boost to Weaponsmaster
